q1: How do you feel about Germany flaming out in the World Cup this year?
a1: I was very surprised that they got eliminated after the first round. I don't think people expected both Mexico and Sweden to advance.
a2: I'm not a fan of Germany, so I enjoyed watching them get eliminated.  Mexico is an exciting team and Sweden was an underdog to advance.
